summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Phase 2.2 Project Management features. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend has authentication working but Projects page routing issues prevent full UI testing.

minor_issues.issue: Date serialization requires string format, not date objects

critical_bugs.issue: Projects page (/projects) redirects to login page instead of rendering Projects component
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks all Projects page functionality testing
critical_bugs.symptoms: User gets redirected to login page when navigating to /projects URL

integration_issues.issue: Frontend authentication state not maintained during navigation to Projects page

resolved_issues.issue: BACKEND_URL import error in project components

action_item_for_E1: Fix frontend Projects page routing issue - the page redirects to login instead of rendering the Projects component. This appears to be an authentication state management or route protection issue. Once fixed, all Projects page UI features should work as the backend APIs are fully functional.

backend_api_status.project_templates: ✅ Working - Returns 3 templates (Software Development, Marketing Campaign, Product Launch)
backend_api_status.project_crud: ✅ Working - Create, Read, Update, Delete all functional
backend_api_status.project_dashboard: ✅ Working - Metrics calculation and analytics working
backend_api_status.milestone_management: ✅ Working - Add and update milestones functional
backend_api_status.data_validation: ✅ Working - Proper validation and error handling

frontend_status.authentication_ui: ✅ Working - Login form and authentication flow functional
frontend_status.main_app_loading: ✅ Working - Dashboard and navigation render correctly
frontend_status.projects_page_routing: ❌ Broken - Redirects to login instead of showing Projects page
frontend_status.projects_components: ❓ Untestable - Cannot access due to routing issue

integration_status.backend_frontend_auth: ✅ Working - Authentication tokens properly generated and accepted
integration_status.api_connectivity: ✅ Working - Frontend can make API calls to backend
integration_status.projects_api_integration: ❓ Untestable - Cannot test due to frontend routing issue
